new.Description:
Melting Point: 1380°C, Carbon Content: 0.85 %

Liquid Steel. When cooled slowly, tough and ductile Pearlite is formed.
When cooled quickly, hard and brittle Martensite is formed.

old.Description:
Melting Point: 1380°C, Carbon Content: 0.85 %

Liquid Steel. When cooled slowly, tough and malleable Austenite and Cementite are formed.
When cooled quickly, hard and brittle Martensite is formed.

original.Name: Molten Steel
original.Description:
Melting Point: 1380°C, Carbon Content: 0.85 %

Liquid Steel. When cooled slowly, tough and ductile Pearlite is formed.
When cooled quickly, hard and brittle Martensite is formed.
